name: replaceList
syntax:
replaceList(String, list1, list2 [, includeEmptyFields])
replaceList(String, list1, list2, delimiter [, includeEmptyFields])
replaceList(String, list1, list2, delimiterList1, delimiterList2 [, includeEmptyFields])
description:
Replaces occurrences of the elements from a delimited list
 in a string with corresponding elements from another delimited
 list. The search is case-sensitive.

params.name: String
params.description: A string, or a variable that contains one, within which to replace substring

params.name: list1
params.description: List of substrings for which to search

params.name: delimiter
params.description: Common delimiter for both search and replacement.

params.name: includeEmptyFields
params.description: When true, zero-length list elements are preserved.
